4. Documentation/metadata: Are you using any software to organize your documents for example Zotero or annotation tools such as NVivo? When using these the Dublin Core metadata standard is often applied. If you like to discuss which tools are available and suitable for your work please contact the rdm helpdesk (rdm@kuleuven.be)
7. Sharing: KU Leuven now has its own repository RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) which you can consider using instead of Zenodo.
